entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 27 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
